scripts.test:api: npm run build && node dist/test/TestRunner.js suite api
scripts.test:http: npm run build && node dist/test/TestRunner.js suite http
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && node dist/test/TestRunner.js suite integration
scripts.test:list: npm run build && node dist/test/TestRunner.js list
scripts.build: tsc --outDir ./dist --target es2018 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop true --allowSyntheticDefaultImports true --strict true --skipLibCheck true *.ts ../src/**/*.ts
scripts.watch: tsc --watch --outDir ./dist --target es2018 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop true --allowSyntheticDefaultImports true --strict true --skipLibCheck true *.ts ../src/**/*.ts
